name: photophobia
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a condition in which light can cause pain or an uncomfortable feeling in the eyes, or the pain or uncomfortable feeling itself: Photophobia is a condition in which the eyes are more sensitive than normal to light. She complained of neck stiffness and photophobia.
More examplesFewer examplesIf a patient reports photophobia, find out when it began and how severe it is.Photophobia and noise sensitivity are prominent features of a common migraine headache.If photophobia results from trauma, avoid manipulating the eyes.
